Hi,  
  
Thanks a lot for help.  
I've added ContentTypeRegExFilter to the =
'midfetch-filter' and  
'write-processors' sections, and now only html/text=
 contents are  
saved into the ARC file.  
  
The one problem I couldn't so=
lve is to accept only URIs that end  
with the specified pattern (for examp=
le, ".doc, *.ppt").  
  
I use 'org.archive.crawler.deciderules.DecidingSco=
pe' in Crawl Scope  
to determine whether a URI is accepted or rejected. So=
, in 'scope'  
section I've added:  
  
<newObject name=3D"filePattern"  
c=
lass=3D"org.archive.crawler.deciderules.MatchesFilePatternDecideRule">  
  =
 <string name=3D"decision">ACCEPT</string>  
   <string name=3D"use-preset-=
pattern">Custom</string>  
   <string name=3D"regexp">.*(?i)(\\.(doc|ppt))$=
</string>  
</newObject>  
  
But in 'crawl.log' file are saved all URIs fr=
om fetched documents.  
How to extract only URIs that match the regexp?  
 =
 
Thanks.  
  
Regards,  
Artem.
